content.p: The University provides a range of rooms on every campus for prayer and religious observance. This includes a Christian chapel, Muslim prayer rooms, and several multi faith prayer rooms which are available to all faiths. These rooms have periods where they are available for personal prayer and reflection, and also some bookable periods for University of Nottingham student and staff faith groups (Muslim prayer rooms are NOT bookable). Please contact us at chaplains@nottingham.ac.uk or 0115 951 3931 to enquire about booking any of our rooms. Multi Faith Prayer Room opposite chapel on A floor. Multi Faith Prayer Room - from the main entrance go past reception to the far end of the corridor, and by the double doors to studio 7 you will find a single door marked "Prayer Room". For students and staff based in the Queens Medical Centre, QMC has a Multi-Faith Centre (including Chapel, Mosque Mandir, Gurdwara and Synagogue) on D Floor, East block. The QMC faith rooms are usually open day and night for prayer or for a quiet space away from the hustle and bustle of the rest of the hospital. You are very welcome to use them, regardless of your beliefs: they are there for all. A29, Portland Building University of Nottingham University Park, Nottingham, NG7 2RD Tel: +44 (0)115 951 3931 Email: chaplains@nottingham.ac.uk
